m_szDocTitle: BMW X5 Plug-In Hybrid To Make Shanghai Debut | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: BMW X5 Plug-In Hybrid To Make Shanghai Debut April 9th, 2015 by Christopher DeMorro   While BMW may not have been the first automaker out of the gate with plug-in cars, the i3 and i8 have been warmly welcomed by Bimmer and EV enthusiasts alike. Alas, the next BMW i car won’t arrive until 2020 at the soonest , but that doesn’t mean there aren’t more plug-in Bimmers on the way. Arriving at the Shanghai Auto Show is a BMW X5 PHEV that could deliver up to 78 MPGe and over 300 horsepower.
